entries.@horde_perk_primary_backpack_t1_descr:
Slightly increases the amount of carried ammo for the primary weapon.

Refills ammo to the maximum.
entries.@horde_perk_primary_backpack_t2_descr:
Moderately increases the amount of carried ammo for the primary weapon.

Refills ammo to the maximum.
entries.@horde_perk_primary_backpack_t3_descr:
Significantly increases the amount of carried ammo for the primary weapon.

Refills ammo to the maximum.
entries.@horde_perk_primary_backpack_t4_descr:
Dramatically increases the amount of carried ammo for the primary weapon.

Refills ammo to the maximum.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_kill_t1_descr: Low chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_kill_t2_descr: Average chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_kill_t3_descr: Good chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_kill_t4_descr: High chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_headshot_t1_descr: Average chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon precision kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_headshot_t2_descr: Good chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon precision kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_headshot_t3_descr: High chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon precision kill.
entries.@horde_perk_ult_headshot_t4_descr: Very high chance to substantially charge your Ultimate upon precision kill.
entries.@horde_perk_aoe_resist_descr:
Armored vest tailored to resist significant amounts of damage from explosions.

Will replace currently equipped Body Armor
entries.@horde_perk_shot_resist_descr:
Armored vest tailored to resist moderate amounts of damage from kinetic projectiles such as bullets.

Will replace currently equipped Body Armor
entries.@horde_perk_melee_resist_descr:
Armored vest tailored to resist moderate amounts of damage from melee attacks.

Will replace currently equipped Body Armor
entries.@horde_perk_melee_heal_descr: Restore a portion of health upon melee kills.
entries.@horde_perk_pistol_heal_descr: Restore a portion of health upon sidearm kills.
entries.@horde_kn03_descr:
Melee buff.

Discharge chain lightning upon melee hits.
entries.@horde_electrify_on_damage_descr: Deal electric counterattacks to melee attackers.
entries.@ult_charger_descr: Your Ultimate ability charges much faster but you lose all charge upon death.
entries.@horde_recharge_while_full_ult_descr: Reduces ability cooldowns while the ultimate is fully charged.
entries.@horde_aifreeze_on_ult_t1_descr: Freezes nearby enemies upon ultimate ability activation.
entries.@horde_aifreeze_on_ult_t2_descr: Freezes enemies in moderate proximity upon ultimate ability activation.
entries.@horde_heal_on_ult_t1_descr: Heals you upon ultimate ability activation.
entries.@horde_heal_on_ult_t2_descr: Heals you and nearby allies upon ultimate ability activation.
entries.@horde_increased_damage_primary_descr:
Greatly increases damage after two kills.

Resets on reload.
entries.@horde_increased_damage_secondary_descr:
Greatly increases damage after a kill.

Resets on reload.
entries.@horde_explosive_shot_primary_descr: The shot after a precision kill becomes explosive.
entries.@horde_explosive_shot_secondary_descr: Ammo becomes explosive after a period of inactivity.
entries.@sr02_power_descr:
POWER WEAPON

Equipped to designated power weapon slot bound to %select_item_slot_power_weapon%
Short-range sniper rifle loaded with explosive rounds.
entries.@pt08_power_descr:
POWER WEAPON

Equipped to designated power weapon slot bound to %select_item_slot_power_weapon%
Trophy pistol. Deals double damage to weak points.
entries.@lmg01_power_descr:
POWER WEAPON

Equipped to designated power weapon slot bound to %select_item_slot_power_weapon%
Low-RPM light machine gun loaded with explosive rounds.
entries.@shg01_power_descr:
POWER WEAPON

Equipped to designated power weapon slot bound to %select_item_slot_power_weapon%
Shotgun loaded with pellets that pierce through flesh.
entries.@horde_create_funnel_on_kill_descr: Gain a chance to create a gravitational anomaly upon kill.
entries.@horde_enemies_explode_when_die_descr: Enemies explode when they die. Enjoy.
entries.@horde_increase_damage_to_marked_descr: Random enemies receive the Mark of Hatred, increasing your damage to them.
entries.@horde_instant_kill_on_hit_descr: Enemies will sometimes explode when you attack them.
entries.@horde_aoe_heal_by_cooldown: Bonds of life about to activate
entries.@horde_aoe_heal_by_cooldown_descr: Gain a chance to randomly heal nearby allies. Healing is proportional to the number of allies in your proximity.
entries.@horde_player_explosion_by_cooldown_desc:
Unique buff.

Gain a chance to unleash a wave of killing energy upon nearby enemies.
entries.@horde_increase_damage_for_allies_descr:
Sidearm buff.

Sidearm shots mark the target. Your allies deal double damage to such targets.
entries.@horde_give_barrier_on_low_health_descr: On critical health, creates a barrier that slows down enemies and protects you from gunfire.
entries.@horde_projectile_shield_descr: Repels any projectiles that come into contact with the operator.
entries.@horde_bind_players_with_lazer_descr: Use slide to create a deadly laser beam between you and the nearest ally. Additional slides renew the laser's lifetime.
entries.@horde_explosive_jump_perk_descr: Create an explosion upon landing. The higher the jump, the bigger the explosion.
entries.@horde_create_laser_saw_on_kill_perk_des: Gain a chance to create a spinning laser upon kill.
entries.@horde_freeze_enemies_by_hit_perk_descr: Gain a chance to freeze an enemy upon hit.
entries.@horde_homing_missiles_perk_descr: Create homing missiles upon attack. Missiles target nearby enemies.
entries.@horde_create_projectile_by_hit_perk_des: Gain a chance to release a deadly projectile upon hit.
entries.@ammo_drop_perk_descr: Additional chance of dropping ammo from fallen enemies.
entries.@overhaste_on_ability_use_descr: After ability use, increases your running speed for a short duration.
entries.@explode_on_slide_kill_descr: Enemies explode when killed during or shortly after a slide.
entries.@decontamination_25_descr:
Zone threat management.

Slightly rolls back the progress of the current stage of contamination.
entries.@decontamination_50_descr:
Zone threat management.

Moderately rolls back the progress of the current stage of contamination.
entries.@decontamination_100_descr:
Zone threat management.

Nullfies the progress of the current stage of contamination.
entries.@strife_perk_descr: Use a secondary weapon to mark an enemy. Marked enemy will cross over to the Shellguard's side for a short time.
entries.@projectile_launch_on_hp_treshold_perk_d: Creates an explosive barrage around you when your health points drop below 50. Cooldown: 1 minute
entries.@horde_staionary_zoom_damage_descr: While aiming: double the damage, but lose the ability to move.
entries.@horde_staionary_zoom_ammo_descr: While aiming: refund ammo on hits, but move much slower.
entries.@extract_soft_descr:
You will extract with all gained rewards upon clearing the extraction point.

Requires at least 2 votes to proceed.

Successful extraction will end the Expedition.
entries.@horde_gamble_descr:
Continue the Expedition to get a double reward upon successful completion of the next objective.

You will lose half of your rewards if your squad dies!
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_pt_descr: Health Cap is increased by 1 on Sidearm kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_ar_descr: Health Cap is increased by 1 on Assault rifle kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_smg_descr: Health Cap is increased by 1 on Submachine gun kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_shg_descr: Health Cap is increased by 3 on Shotgun kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_sr_descr: Health Cap is increased by 2 on Sniper rifle kills. Resets on death.
entries.@regen_chance_perk_descr:
Life Cell buff.

Life Cell drop chance is doubled.
entries.@regen_limit_perk_descr:
Life Cell buff.

Doubles the amount of Life Cells dropped.
entries.@regen_speedup_t1_descr: Regeneration speed on cell pickup is slightly improved.
entries.@regen_speedup_t2_descr: Regeneration speed on cell pickup is moderately improved.
entries.@regen_speedup_t3_descr: Regeneration speed on cell pickup is significantly improved.
entries.@regen_speedup_t4_descr: Regeneration speed on cell pickup is dramatically improved.
entries.@invul_on_regen_pickup_descr: Life Cells grant brief invulnerability on pickup.
entries.@regen_bodybuilder_perk_t1_descr: When fully healed by a Life Cell, increase your Max Health by 1 for up to 20. Resets on death.
entries.@regen_bodybuilder_perk_t2_descr: When fully healed by a Life Cell, increase your Max Health by 2 for up to 30. Resets on death.
entries.@regen_bodybuilder_perk_t3_descr: When fully healed by a Life Cell, increase your Max Health by 3 for up to 50. Resets on death.
entries.@regen_pickup_impulse_perk_descr: Life Cells unleash a gravity impulse upon nearby foes.
entries.@arsenal_perk_descr: Allows to assign any weapon to any slot.
entries.@arsenal_slot_1_descr: Assign selected weapon to the Primary slot.
entries.@arsenal_slot_2_descr: Assign selected weapon to the Sidearm slot.
entries.@horde_perk_manual_therapy_descr: Restore a significant amount of Health on Ability kill.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_kill_lightning_descr: Chance to discharge a chain lightning upon kill while on Max Health Cap.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_headshot_explode_desc: Enemies killed with precision shots explode while you are on Max Health Cap.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_speedup_descr: Doubles the on-kill increase of Bodybuilder Health Cap.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_regen_descr: Regenerate a portion of health upon Health Cap increase.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_charger_descr: Your abilities and Ultimate charge faster when on Max Health Cap.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_cap_retain_descr: You only lose a half of your Bodybuilder Health Cap upon death.
entries.@bodybuilder_ammo_descr: Restore some Primary weapon ammo upon Health Cap increase.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_ult_descr: Health Cap is increased by 10 on Ultimate ability kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_kn_descr: Health Cap is increased by 3 on Melee kills. Resets on death.
entries.@horde_bodybuilder_ability_descr: Health Cap is increased by 3 on Ability kills. Resets on death.
